name: Ranch House
details: Ranch houses are single-story homes often with an open floor plan and large windows.

name: Cape Cod House
details: Cape Cod houses feature steep roofs, wood siding, multi-pane windows, and dormers.

name: Colonial House
details: Colonial houses are symmetrical, with a centered front door, evenly spaced windows, and brick or wood facades

name: Victorian House
details: Victorian houses are known for their ornate detailing, asymmetrical shapes, and vibrant colors.

name: Tudor House
details: Tudor houses feature steeply pitched gable roofs, decorative half-timbering, and tall, narrow windows.

name: Bungalow House
details: Bungalows are small, cozy homes with low-pitched roofs and wide front porches.

name: Craftsman House
details: Craftsman houses emphasize handcrafted woodwork, built-in furniture, and large front porches with thick columns.

name: Mediterranean House
details: Mediterranean houses have stucco walls, red-tiled roofs, and arched windows and doorways.

name: Farm House
details: Farmhouses are practical homes with large front porches, gabled roofs, and a central chimney.

name: Cotemporary House
details: Contemporary houses have clean lines, open spaces, and incorporate modern materials like glass and steel.
